items.sentence: Tom and Mary were sitting together at the bar.
Tom and Mary were stranded on a desert island.
Tom and his friends skated on the frozen pond.
I didn\'t know that Tom was born in Australia.
I didn\'t know the police were looking for me.
I didn\'t know there was a swimming pool here.
The man who lives next door to me is a doctor.
The meeting started at 2:30 and ended at 5:00.
The only thing I want to do today is watch TV.
I thought you\'d speak French better than Tom.
